glu.title: Holy Frog
glu.altText: Image of the game Holy Frog with a frog character
glu.description: Developed in Unity 6, this solo project is a 2D platformer where you control a frog that can jump and shoot. The game features a variety of enemies and obstacles, with the goal of reaching the end of each level as fast as possible. The frog can use its tongue as a rope to swing across gaps. The game includes a timer to track completion time, as well as full controller support for most devices. PC only with an expirimental mobile build.
